snippet.title: Comet Rogue Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
WISHLIST COMET ROGUE, THE FRANTIC MINING ROGUELIKE:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3252310/Comet_Rogue/?

Join the Comet Rogue Discord server for exclusive updates!
https://discord.gg/Qu27VR4w6h

Comet Rogue is an intense mining roguelike where you must extract gold from asteroids to appease an evil AI. While doing so, don't get KILLED by all the aliens that are constantly attacking you! (Aliens include but are not limited to: Dribblers, Sloplings, Oozers, and Homiludge!)

🦅Twitter: https://twitter.com/GearAntique
